oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to colophon (f. 64v), copy completed in the hand of Fatḥ Muḥammad walad Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh Sahrandī (?) on Muḥarram 25 (the year is not given).
Written in one column, 15 lines per page, in black and red.
MS Persian 88. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
